name: Tim Wendelboe Aeropress recipe
description: A recipe by Tim Wendelboe, World Barista Champion.

steps.instruction: Rinse the paper filter thoroughly with tap water, then pour in the coffee grounds.
Slowly pour {waterAmount}g of hot water over the coffee grounds in a circular motion.
Stir the coffee gently 3 times to ensure all grounds are wet.
Place the plunger on top and let the coffee steep for a minute.
Stir 3 more times from back to front to redistribute the grounds.
Press the coffee into a cup using steady pressure and body weight.

name: James Hoffmann Aeropress recipe
description: A recipe by James Hoffmann, World Barista Champion.

steps.instruction: Rinse the paper filter thoroughly with tap water, then add the coffee grounds.
Carefully pour {waterAmount}g of water over the coffee grounds.
Place the plunger just 1cm into the brewer to create a seal.
Let the coffee brew for 2 minutes without disturbing it.
Gently swirl the Aeropress to agitate the coffee.
Allow the coffee to settle for 30 more seconds.
Press down gently and steadily all the way to extract the coffee.

name: Alan Adler Aeropress recipe
description: A recipe by Alan Adler, the inventor of Aeropress.

steps.instruction: Add the ground coffee to the chamber, then shake it to level the coffee bed.
Pour {waterAmount}g of hot water into the chamber slowly and evenly.
Use the paddle to stir the coffee thoroughly to ensure even extraction.
Insert the plunger and press down gently until all the coffee is extracted.

name: Wendelien van Bunnik Aeropress recipe
description: A recipe by Wendelien van Bunnik, 2019 World AeroPress Champion.

steps.instruction: Add the ground coffee to the Aeropress and shake it to create a flat coffee bed.
Pour {waterAmount}g of hot water evenly into the chamber over the coffee.
Stir the coffee 5 times quickly to ensure even saturation.
Let the coffee sit for a while, then flip the Aeropress and press steadily.
